title: Coronation chicken salad with cashews and raisins
ingredients: ['450g (1 lb) cooked chicken breast, chopped', '2 sticks celery, thinly sliced', '110g (4 oz) raisins or sultanas', '110g (4 oz) roasted and salted whole cashew nuts', '225g (8 oz) mayonnaise', '1 heaped tablespoon curry powder', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'sprig of fresh basil, to garnish']
